need to reduce our consumption.
Unsaturated fats are healthier fats that 
are usually from plant sources and in 
liquid form as oil, for example vegetable 
oil, rapeseed oil and olive oil. Swapping 
to unsaturated fats will help to reduce 
cholesterol in the blood, therefore it is 
important to get most of our fat from 
unsaturated oils.
Choosing lower fat spreads, as opposed 
to butter, is a good way to reduce your 
saturated fat intake. Remember that all
